text: “Ezɨ dughiar atrivir kaba ikiavɨra itimɨn, Godɨn Uan Nguibamɨn Itim, a Dughiar a Gumazamizibagh Ativaghamin Tam a damightɨ, an otivam. Eghtɨ a ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ atrivir maba da God Gumazamizibagh Ativaghamin Dughiar Kam dɨkabɨraghan kogham. Eghtɨ God Gumazamizibagh Ativaghamin Dughiam, an atrivir igharazibagh asɨghasigham. Eghtɨ an atrivir dughiar kam a ikɨ mamaghɨra ikɨvɨra ikiam.
